WorkItem.Description:
When i'm at a vendor, be it the valor or justice point trader or one of the quartermasters, I'd like to see a message, preferrably with sound:
Â 
"Hey this vendor sells the following upgrades for you:
BOE boots: Eternal Pathfinders: 1650 Valorpoints (you have 1650/1650 points required)"
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Addon] If a Vendor offers items, give a message

Comments.Message: Decent suggestion I'll investigate the possibility.
you might also want to link tier-tokens with the setpieces that can be bought with them., so if you need a setpiece and its token drops /is sold, alert the user.
